name: Mssng Lttrs Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: When I got home my pet CT was missing. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
cat.

	The house cat can be traced back to ancient Egypt more than 3,000 years ago. However they are thought to have been first domesticated thousands of years earlier in the middle east.

questions.text: When I was a teenager my PRNTS were always bothering me. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
parents.

	Parents! Who needs them, at least that's what many teens seem to think. Teens and their parents tend to be at odds when the teenager is trying to develop his or her own sense of self away from the familial unit.

questions.text: Prior to the advent of television most people read NWSPPRS to get their news. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
newspapers.

	While newspapers were on the decline in the early part of the 21st century, they were the key source of news in the early part of the 20th century. What a difference 100 years makes.

questions.text: I collect plastic action figures that look like TRTLS. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
Turtles.

	The "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" toy line were one of the largest lines released worldwide in the 1980s and 90s.

questions.text: May I borrow a piece of chewing GM? What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
gum.

	Eww! No you may never "borrow" a piece of gum. Once it's been chewed I never want it back. You may have one, and maybe sometime in the future give me one in exchange. Chewing gum dates back more than 3,000 years. Chew but don't swallow!

questions.text: In my free time I enjoy reading BKS. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
books.

	Books, what a novel concept. Too many people read everything electronically these days. You never have to worry about the battery dying on a book! My favorite books are comic books.

questions.text: Buffy was a VMPR slayer. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
vampire.

	"Buffy the Vampire Slayer" was first a movie, and later a television series which spawned comics, toys, video games and more. In the popular series the titular character was played by Sarah Michelle Gellar.

questions.text: There is a solar CLPS later this week. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
eclipse.

	A solar eclipse happens when the moon blocks out the sun as seen on Earth. There are four different types of solar eclipse, including the self explaining total and partial eclipse.  The third type is an annular eclipse where the moon blocks out only the center of the sun, leaving the edges visible. The final type is a hybrid eclipse, where is starts as an annular and becomes a total.

questions.text: Actors are also known as THSPNS. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
thespians.

	The word thespian simply means "actor or actress". The earliest recorded actors date back to ancient Greek culture.

questions.text: The BTLS are one of the most popular bands ever formed. What is the word that is missing letters?
questions.explanation:
Beatles.

	The Beatles, John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr, were active from 1960 to 1970.
